MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I will dispose of you in justice.
As she quietly announced this, Columbia swung her sword with blinding speed. The mysterious monster that had appeared on the school grounds was instantly shredded by her. However--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: PIGYAAAH!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: PIGYUUH! PIGYUUH!

More and more of the same type of monsters wriggled(?) here and there, making deafening cries. The Special Steel Squad cadets should be used to emergency situations, yet they quickly panicked and were unable to cope - Perhaps they were caught off guard by the Valentine's Day atmosphere.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Anzio
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: KYA, YAAAH!? What on earth is going on, oh my God, what is this!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Part-Dieu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Are you blind or something? A large number of monsters have appeared on the school grounds.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Anzio
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: T-that's why I've been thinking about it - Eeeek!? Just seeing the monsters stresses me ooooout～ I-I'm posseeeessed♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Calm down.
For some reason, Anzio is making a happy fuss. Columbia looked at her, thought for a bit and only shook her Captain in disgust - She then issued orders.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Those of you standing in line there, follow my instructions. I'll name each person directly, Miss Anzio, Miss Part-Dieu, Miss Carthage, Miss Blanche--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: You four are hereby conscripted as the 'Valentine Task Force'. No objections or counter-arguments will be accepted, and if you defy me, you will be punished with my authority as the Inspector General.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Eh, eeeh...? But we don't even know what this Inspector General position is, do we?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: - But whatever, I guess we don't have a choice. I'll read the room and I'll comply. What do you want me to do, umm, - petite Columbia?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: It's disrespectful to call me 'petite'. I'll lead the other students to safety, while you four take care of the monsters that have sprung up on the ground.
Recognising the unusually understanding Blanche as the leader of the four, Columbia only instructed her alone - Loudspeaker in hand, she called out to the other students.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'Attention SSS cadets! Do not panic, do not make a fuss, and evacuate to the school building in single file! Before you do so, throw away any chocolate in your possession!'

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No, again so why are you still caring about the chocolate...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: 'I'm thinking the situation is already obvious enough, didn't your chocolate just turned into a monster? That's why we throw it away, is that hard to understand?'

Yeah, that's a concise and clear explanation. In fact, many of the chocolates thrown away by the students that reflexively followed the instructions melted and mixed with the soil in the academy yard - And turned into monsters.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pygyaaaah!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Carthage
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hmm. What is the logic behind this? I am curious. I would like you to explain the situation in detail.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I will. But for now, we'll put that behind us and dispose of the monsters.

After watching the students evacuated, Columbia walked silently without even sounds of footsteps. She then swung her sword in all directions and accurately cut down the monsters that had sprung up nearby.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: She's strong... She's definitely not to be messed with if you go against her.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Part-Dieu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Hear hear. I hate her, but I guess we have to obey her for now.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeah, for I am the protagonist of my story. You girls should stay out of my way and rather work to enhance me as much as possible. First of all--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Anzio, use your bow and arrow, and Part-Dieu, use your artifact to suppress. You two will redirect the enemy monsters to the centre of the ground, so Miss Blanche will sweep them together.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Then any stragglers that survived will be crushed by me and Carthage, as we're highly mobile.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Carthage
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: This is a precise tactic... You seem to know a lot about our abilities.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I've already screened everyone in the SSS - Because that's the job of the Inspector General. And I have a perfect memory for information once I have it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That means I know all your qualities, all your capabilities. I will put you to good use on that basis and you will follow my instructions if you want great results.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I don't like the way you say it... But it's fine, it's my job to dance upon request after all.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I'll do my best, I'll read the room.
Blanche uttered her usual lines and proceeded to the centre of the ground, carrying her axe. Seemingly anticipating her move, Columbia quickly slashed down the monsters in her way.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Merci.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Non. Now, suppress.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Anzio
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yeeahss～ pleaseh leave eet to me! It's tempting to disobey and fail and get punished later on purpose, but I'm afraid I'll get my Captain lopped off without question in that caseee☆
Anzio, acting strangely, aimed her bow into the sky and shot a bunch of arrows that appeared random. Yet every one of her arrows accurately pierced each monster that was trying to escape.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Part-Dieu
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: --Soeur, assist that crazy ponce.

Part-Dieu also activated her artifact, causing a ghostly apparition she calls her 'older sister' to appear. While we cannot see her 'sister', she seemed to be moving to keep the monsters in check, as instructed.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Pygyaaa!? Piggyaaaah!?
Scared by the arrows and suppressed by the 'sister', the monsters are led to the centre of the grounds. Once they were gathered en masse, Blanche did a light stretch, and--.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Now then, I'm unwilling to dance as there's not much of an audience, but I'll show you my Forench Can Can♪

Blanche swung one leg up high, then down, and began to spun furiously, using such momentum to her advantage. She swivelled her whole body flourishly and utilised the centrifugal force to swing her axe, which is much heavier than it looks.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Blanche
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Spinny, spinny～ Look at me going spinny～♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Monster
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: PIGGYAAAAH!
Almost as if caught in a storm, the monsters were gutted, dismembered and blown to shreds. Some were lucky enough to escape Blanche's onslaught, yet -

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Carthage
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: --Hmph.
Carthage's axe moved at extraordinary speeds, and crushed them like insects. In no time at all, the mass of monsters is vaporized.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Mhm. My, that's good. Meeting my expectations.
Columbia walked up to me, swiftly sheathing her sword, as if she intended to leave the rest to Blanche's group. Then, with a sarcastic twist of her lips, she whispered to me--

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Columbia
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Handing out the correct instructions to your men and solving anomalies - This is supposed to be your role. If you ever intend to stand alongside me as my companion, you'll have to work a little harder than that - Mr. Conductor.
Yeah no, I have neither plans nor reasons to be Columbia's companion.
